Package com.netflix.genie.web.spring.autoconfigure.agent.inspectors

Class AgentInspectorsAutoConfiguration

java.lang.Object
com.netflix.genie.web.spring.autoconfigure.agent.inspectors.AgentInspectorsAutoConfiguration
@Configuration @ConditionalOnProperty(value="genie.agent.filter.enabled", havingValue="true") @EnableConfigurationProperties(AgentFilterProperties.class) public class AgentInspectorsAutoConfiguration extends Object
Auto-configuration for the default implementations of AgentMetadataInspectors.

This configuration creates a set of pre-configured AgentMetadataInspector that the service loads and uses: - Version whitelist: accept agent only if version matches a given pattern - Version blacklist: reject agent if version matches a given pattern - Minimum version: reject agent whose version is lower than a given version

Since:
4.0.0
